thread.title: Chicago girls age 11 and 12 both shot in the head | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Chicago girls age 11 and 12 both shot in the head | Daily Mail Online

author: Keith Griffith For Dailymail.Com
title: Chicago girls age 11 and 12 both shot in the head | Daily Mail Online
text: Two girls, age 11 and 12, are both shot in the head within half an hour in Chicago, while playing at an elementary school and sitting in a car Two preteen girls were shot and critically wounded in Chicago on Saturday The shootings came less than 30 minutes apart, in two different neighborhoods One girl was sitting in a parked minivan; the other at a school playground Cops have no suspects in custody, say girls were not intended targets Two others were killed, and four wounded, in Chicago shootings on Saturday Published: 01:05 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 02:32 GMT, 13 February 2017 59 shares
